body: For every 7 days you were away from the settlement (whether downtime days or normal days), reduce your Goods, Influence, Labor, and Magic by 1 each (minimum 0). This decrease represents spoilage, theft, allies moving on or having higher priorities, workers finding other employment, and so on.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime/Downtime Phases/Upkeep Phase/Step 3-Determine Capital Attrition
name: Step 3-Determine Capital Attrition
